text: @AmyMcGrathKY @dontpanic1955 He’s trying to avoid the next stimulus negotiation of $2,000 per month while the COVID19 Pandemic continues which could be at least for the next 12-18 months or so! Rep. Tim Ryan is one of those proposing this legislation!
